name: Music Monsters-Merge Masters!
description:
Join in an adventure of Music Monsters!
Bleed、feed、Merge them to take a song!

Idle a monster egg, then feed your musical Monster to help them grow. And you will see a great diversity of fun Monster characters in these fantastic islands for the whole family!

Decorate every island with fulling of Music Monsters, then you will get your magical song which made by breeding and upgrading lovely Monster pets. You will call duties on feeding the monsters. Design and put unique decorations to make your Choir in the way you want. You can completely play a role of composer by editing beautiful song when you change the position of every Monster.
The most important is sharing your composition with your friends and you also can get coins and monsters from your friends through clashing a visit on it.You will love to explore the marvelous blast land of the Monster Music World!

Download Music Monsters today —Discover the music Journey and the monsters Kingdom !

FEATURES:
- Have a collection and upgrade over 100 cute and funny Monsters — Bowtruckle, Mowgliass and some exotic species you have never heard…
Merge different eggs to make new species
- Customize your Islands with different decorations to design your homw and the alluring music will blast your ears. Every kart will let you experience different tour.
- Enjoy building senior Breeding Room、Hatchery、Restaurant and level up all your monsters.
- Become the super composer and create the BGM belongs to yourself.
- Visit your friends' home and take some coins occasionally to be a coin master in the Arena

Tips:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Musicmonstersgame/
HELP & SUPPORT: pandayuankaixin@gmail.com
PLEASE NOTE! ：
1.Music Monsters is a completely free game, however some game items can also be for purchase by money. If you don't like this you can view some ads in-app insteadly.
2 Description of subscription and announcement of Apple official subscription feature about "Music monsters”

Subscription
1.Subscription price and period
You can subscribe “Weekly Card” in the game, price is $1.99 to $ 9.99and period is one week.
2.Subscription contents
Users can get a privileged experience during the subscription period, the contents contain:
(1) Diamond Weekly Card provides you with a 7-day weekly subscription service for $1.99
(2) VIP Weekly Card provides you with a 7-day weekly subscription service for $9.99
(3) Food Weekly Card provides you with a 7-day weekly subscription service for $4.99
You can subscribe to a free 3-day trial period, and you will pay for the subscription after the trial ends.
3.Auto-renewing subscription
Apple App Store official subscription is auto-renewing subscription, confirmed payment by iTunes Account directly. Users need to manually turn off auto-renewing subscription in iTunes/Apple ID setting management. Auto-renewing subscription will be withheld within 24 hours of the end of each subscription cycle, confirmed payment by iTunes Account directly. If you need to unsubscribe, you need to turn off auto-renewing subscription at least 24 hours before the end of each subscription cycle. If auto-renewing subscription not be canceled before this time, the subscription cycle will be extended automatically.If you have any service which is not used(if provided) in the free trial, it will be invalid when you take this subscription. Renewal fees will be charged to your account within 24 hours before the end of your current subscription period, at which time you will be asked to confirm your renewal fees.
4. Terms of Service：http://feidou.kaixin001.com/notice_gwyt_1.html
5. Privacy Policy：http://feidou.kaixin001.com/notice_gwyt_2.html
